name: Happy Numbers
overview:
Despite the incursion of calculators and computers in all aspects
concerning numbers, there is no doubt that mental ease and
fast and frequent manipulation of numbers is of great importance for children and
Adults. This ability allows people to enter numerical tasks with
more confident, either in the supermarket or at the university, and gives them
advantage over those who do not possess this ability. With this in mind it is for
much effort is devoted to the teaching of arithmetic operations in
The school r.

The Painter of Numbers can have players with simple arithmetic ability;
The same judge will cheer you on. Some vital concepts in mathematics
